short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1. Helps to auto close duplicate popup windows opened by ANI CTI Popup. 2. Reactivates previously active tab after a tab was closed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a helper application for ilink's ANI CTI Popup Windows client.
If you are not using the ilink ANI CTI Popup Windows client, there is no reason to install this extension.

Feature 1:
Users of ANI CTI Popup may have the problem that duplicate web application windows are opened.
Feature 1 of this extension helps by detecting those cases and causing the older windows to close themselves. So there will be no duplicate windows of the same web application.

Feature 2:
The ANI CTI Popup Windows client opens new web browser tabs. When these are being closed, the web browser will not always activate the tab that had been active before the ANI CTI Popup Windows client had opened the new tab.
Feature 2 is for users who prefer the previously active tab to always be activated in such a case. It makes sure this is will happen.
